means: 反复述说，唠唠叨叨地反复讲

sentence.Network_en: Don't keep harping on like that.
You're always harping on the samestring.
She concentrated on the good parts of her trip instead of harping on about the bad.
sentence.Network_cn: 她着重说了自己旅途中遇到的开心事，并没有唠叨那些不愉快的事。

PerfectNetExp.abs: She is always harping on my faults ., 她总是反复谈论我的缺点.

entry.def: A harp is a large musical instrument consisting of a row of strings stretched from the top to the bottom of a frame. You play the harp by plucking the strings with your fingers.

auth_sentence.content: It really is so much more than just cyclists harping on.
auth_sentence.res_content: It really is so much more than just cyclists harping on.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It really is so much more than just cyclists harping on.

auth_sentence.content: My only daughter keeps harping on things that I don't even remember happening.
auth_sentence.res_content: My only daughter keeps harping on things that I don't even remember happening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My only daughter keeps harping on things that I don't even remember happening.

auth_sentence.content: Opening with the harping Wake Up, Sleepyhead, a cloudy dream of snugly and nursery rhyme-like lulling descends.
auth_sentence.res_content: Opening with the harping Wake Up, Sleepyhead, a cloudy dream of snugly and nursery rhyme-like lulling descends.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Opening with the harping Wake Up, Sleepyhead, a cloudy dream of snugly and nursery rhyme-like lulling descends.
